CustomField.formula: Account_Cross_Ref__r.External_Account_Name__c & ' '& BR() & if(LEN(Account_Cross_Ref__r.External_Email_Addr__c) > 0 , 'Email: '&Account_Cross_Ref__r.External_Email_Addr__c &' '& BR() ,' ')& if(LEN(Account_Cross_Ref__r.External_Main_Phone__c) > 0 , 'PH: '&Account_Cross_Ref__r.External_Main_Phone__c & BR() ,'')& if(LEN(Account_Cross_Ref__r.External_Main_Fax__c) > 0 ,'FAX: '&Account_Cross_Ref__r.External_Main_Fax__c & BR() ,'')& if(LEN(Account_Cross_Ref__r.External_Address_Line_1__c ) > 0 , 'Addr: '& Account_Cross_Ref__r.External_Address_Line_1__c & BR() ,'')& if(LEN(Account_Cross_Ref__r.External_Address_Line_2__c) > 0 ,Account_Cross_Ref__r.External_Address_Line_2__c & BR() ,'')& if(LEN(Account_Cross_Ref__r.External_Address_Line_3__c) > 0 , Account_Cross_Ref__r.External_Address_Line_3__c & BR() ,'')& if(LEN(Account_Cross_Ref__r.External_City_Name__c) > 0 ,Account_Cross_Ref__r.External_City_Name__c & BR() ,'')& if(LEN(Account_Cross_Ref__r.External_State_Code__c) > 0 , Account_Cross_Ref__r.External_State_Code__c & BR() ,'')& if(LEN(Account_Cross_Ref__r.External_Country_Name__c) > 0 , Account_Cross_Ref__r.External_Country_Name__c & BR() ,'')& if(LEN(Account_Cross_Ref__r.External_Postal_Code__c) > 0 ,Account_Cross_Ref__r.External_Postal_Code__c & BR() ,'')
CustomField.label: Contact Details
